item.description:
A murder has occurred and YOUR detective skills will be put to the test as you question suspects, cross-examine stories, figure out how, where and who dunnit, while navigating the world's most complex, adventure cornfield maze!

Do you have what it takes to solve this MEGA MAZE MYSTERY and find your way out?

I did this maze a few years ago, was in it for 3 hours and had to ask directions how to get out. It has 7 bridges, with mics on them, so you can taunt members in your group or other team. There is also a snack bar and bathrooms inside the maze. We could stop on the way home for a pizza or...

check out these links for directions and prices

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kxa9FBK1ONk

davismegamaze.com
item.name: Davis Mega Maze, Sterling, MA
